nodes.text: Wullffwarro's World of Wood was a location owned by the Wookiee Wullffwarro on the planet Kashyyyk. At least one of their advertisements requested that people visit it for classic Kashyyyk crafts, such as bowcasters or battle shields made of wroshyr. The advertisement was written in High Galactic alphabet and was eventually collected in Yoda's Guide to the Galaxy, a book written by the Jedi Master Yoda during his exile on Dagobah.
Wullffwarro's World of Wood was first mentioned in the 2021 non-canon reference book LEGO Star Wars Yoda's Galaxy Atlas.
